title: How to change video setting when it cant be done in game?
body:
Currently, I cant actually change my visual settings because I cant click the enter button as the screen is just zoomed in so far I cant even see the side tabs of the options menu. Is there a way to change this so I can actually play and will there be an option of  changing in game settings, outside of the game coming to the new client?

TyTy

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should be able to simply edit the **game.cfg** file located under **/Riot Games/League of Legends/Config/**

The resolution settings are under the **[General]** heading and are **Height** and **Width** respectively.

Most interface settings can be accessed from within the LCU's settings dialogue under the **In-Game > Interface** menu.
